data.script:
<script>
    import {Box, Stack} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Stack
    class="stack-wrap"
    orientation="horizontal"
    spacing="huge"
    variation="wrap"
>
    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />

    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />

    <Box palette="alert" />
</Stack>

<style>
    :global(.stack-wrap .box) {
        width: 6rem;
        height: 6rem;
    }
</style>
data.title: Stack Wrap
